DOC.brief_summary: This study is to assess the safety and tolerability of Cediranib (RECENTIN™, AZD2171)in combination with etoposide and cisplatin (EP) as first line treatment for lung cancer patients with extensive stage or metastatic disease for whom EP would be a standard therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Safety and Tolerability Study of Cediranib (RECENTIN™, AZD2171) in Combination With Chemo in First Line Lung Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: Cancer diagnosis and stage (histological or cytological confirmed extensive stage lung cancer, which EP would be considered a standard therapy, required at the time of diagnosis.) No prior chemotherapy or immunotherapy for advanced stage lung cancer (prior radiotherapy will be permitted if it is outside of the measurable field and greater than or equal to 2 weeks prior to entry to the study.) WHO performance status 02 Untreated unstable brain or meningeal metastases Patient with inappropriate laboratory tests values Inadequate bone marrow reserve.
